work.title: Web Developer

Building front-end components with javascript,HTML and CSS.Processing financial data. Responsible for most vital part of development life cycle including reviewing specifications, implementations and deployment.

work.title: Software Developer

testimonials.text: Mrs Vasudev possesses excellent specialist knowledge extending far beyond mainstream. She was able to understand complex situations immediately and was able to find excellent solutions right away.
